topics.body: I have latent disdain. Will I ever be happy?
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dff19b6368727e6f5d0100#post_53dff19b6368727e6f5d0100

Happiness is a very subjective term overall.

If you really think about it, there's no such thing as happiness, but a state of temporal satisfaction.

"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dff2ae6368722d916b0000#post_53dff2ae6368722d916b0000

Happiness is defined as the absolute state of extasi a person can experiment in his life, the point where he has done everything and fulfilled all of his goals and has nothing else to achieve, ergo, something unachiveable (According to Nietzche at least)
